thread.title: A perfect sky provides perfect backdrop for 'Sunset Sips'
thread.title_full: A perfect sky provides perfect backdrop for 'Sunset Sips'

author: William Thornton | wthornton@al.com
title: A perfect sky provides perfect backdrop for 'Sunset Sips'
text:
Comments 
All the ingredients for Gadsden's "Sunset Sips" were in evidence tonight - good food, good music, pleasant conversation and a clear sky. 
The yearly fundraiser for Downtown Gadsden Inc., "Sunset Sips" turns Gadsden's Memorial Bridge at Broad Street into an open air venue. Attendees can usually be seen with phones in hand to take pictures of the view. Sunset Sips: Oct. 20, 2015 Gadsden's Memorial Bridge at Broad Street was once again the scene of Sunset Sips, a fundraiser for Downtown Gadsden Inc. (William Thornton / wthornton@al.com) 
Downtown Gadsden Inc. Director Kay Moore said the event was once again sold out. 
"The response was just great," she said. 
Last year, the event won an award from Main Street Alabama. In years past, proceeds have funded downtown banners, a sound system and other improvements to the downtown Gadsden business district. 
The event was the brainchild of Mayor Sherman Guyton, who saw it as a way to showcase the bridge, the Coosa River and its view.
